      • reScanFiles

        public ScanInfo[] reScanFiles(String[] resources)
                       throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                              UnauthorizedAccessException,
                              InvalidArguentsException,
                              Exception
        Description copied from interface: VirustotalPublicV2
        Re-scan a given set of resources
        Specified by:
        reScanFiles in interface VirustotalPublicV2
        Parameters:
        resources - a set of md5/sha1/sha256 hashes. You can also specify a CSV list made up of a combination of any of the three allowed hashes (up to 25 items), this allows you to perform a batch request with one single call. Note that the file must already be present in our file store.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        UnauthorizedAccessException
        InvalidArguentsException
        Exception

      • getScanReport

        public FileScanReport getScanReport(String resource)
                             throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                    UnauthorizedAccessException,
                                    Exception
        Description copied from interface: VirustotalPublicV2
        Retrieve report for a scanned resource
        Specified by:
        getScanReport in interface VirustotalPublicV2
        Parameters:
        resource - a md5/sha1/sha256 hash will retrieve the most recent report on a given sample. You may also specify a scan_id (sha256-timestamp as returned by the file upload API) to access a specific report. You can also specify a CSV list made up of a combination of hashes and scan_ids (up to 4 items with the standard request rate), this allows you to perform a batch request with one single call.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        UnauthorizedAccessException
        Exception

      • scanUrls

        public ScanInfo[] scanUrls(String[] urls)
                    throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                           UnauthorizedAccessException,
                           Exception
        Description copied from interface: VirustotalPublicV2
        scan a set of given URLs
        Specified by:
        scanUrls in interface VirustotalPublicV2
        Parameters:
        urls - set of urls to be scanned, accepts a list of URLs (up to 4 with the standard request rate) so as to perform a batch scanning request with one single call. The URLs must be separated by a new line character.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        UnauthorizedAccessException
        Exception

      • getUrlScanReport

        public FileScanReport[] getUrlScanReport(String[] urls,
                                boolean scan)
                                  throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                         UnauthorizedAccessException,
                                         Exception
        Description copied from interface: VirustotalPublicV2
        Retrieve reports for a given set of urls
        Specified by:
        getUrlScanReport in interface VirustotalPublicV2
        Parameters:
        urls - set of urls, a URL will retrieve the most recent report on the given URL. You may also specify a scan_id (sha256-timestamp as returned by the URL submission API) to access a specific report. At the same time, you can specify a CSV list made up of a combination of hashes and scan_ids so as to perform a batch request with one single call (up to 4 resources per call with the standard request rate).
        scan - true if url s must be scanned before generating the report
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        UnauthorizedAccessException
        Exception

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • makeAComment

        public GeneralResponse makeAComment(String resource,
                           String comment)
                             throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                    UnauthorizedAccessException,
                                    Exception
        Description copied from interface: VirustotalPublicV2
        Make a comment
        Specified by:
        makeAComment in interface VirustotalPublicV2
        Parameters:
        resource - either a md5/sha1/sha256 hash of the file you want to review or the URL itself that you want to comment on.
        comment - the actual review, you can tag it using the "#" twitter-like syntax (e.g. #disinfection #zbot) and reference users using the "@" syntax (e.g. @VirusTotalTeam).
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        UnauthorizedAccessException
        Exception
